select ri.id, ri.user_id, ri.price, ri.register_date, ri.dept_id, ri.staff_id, ri.start_date, ri.end_date, ri.status, ri.pay_date, ri.file, ri.remark, ri.code, ri.drug_price, ri.reference, ri.create_date, ri.schedule_id, oi.offices_name, hi.hospital_name, hi.images as hospitalImages, ui.name, ui.phone, ui.address as userAddress, di.doctor_name, di.images from register_info ri left join office_info oi on (oi.id = ri.dept_id) left join hospital_info hi on (hi.id = oi.hospital_id) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = ri.user_id) left join doctor_info di on (di.id = ri.staff_id) where 1 = 1
AND ri.id IN
#{id}
order by ri.create_date desc

select oi.id, oi.user_id, oi.price, oi.register_date, oi.dept_id, oi.staff_id, oi.start_date, oi.end_date, oi.status, oi.pay_date, oi.file, oi.remark, oi.code, oi.drug_price, oi.reference, oi.create_date, oi.schedule_id from register_info oi left join office_info ofi on (ofi.id = oi.dept_id) where DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y%m')
AND ofi.hospital_id = #{hospitalId}

SELECT dateTemp.date AS date, count( ri.id ) AS count FROM ( SELECT date FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( DATE_SUB( last_day( curdate()), INTERVAL xc - 1 DAY ), '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS date FROM ( SELECT @xi := @xi + 1 AS xc FROM ( SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 ) xc1, ( SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 ) xc2, ( SELECT @xi := 0 ) xc0 ) xcxc ) x0 WHERE x0.date >= ( SELECT date_add( curdate(), INTERVAL - DAY ( curdate())+ 1 DAY ))) AS dateTemp LEFT JOIN register_info ri ON ( DATE_FORMAT( ri.register_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( dateTemp.date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AND ri.STATUS != '0' AND ri.STATUS != '5' ) GROUP BY dateTemp.date

SELECT dateTemp.date AS date, count( si.id ) AS count FROM ( SELECT date FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( DATE_SUB( last_day( curdate()), INTERVAL xc - 1 DAY ), '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS date FROM ( SELECT @xi := @xi + 1 AS xc FROM ( SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 ) xc1, ( SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 ) xc2, ( SELECT @xi := 0 ) xc0 ) xcxc ) x0 WHERE x0.date >= ( SELECT date_add( curdate(), INTERVAL - DAY ( curdate())+ 1 DAY ))) AS dateTemp LEFT JOIN schedule_info si ON ( DATE_FORMAT( si.task_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( dateTemp.date, '%Y-%m-%d' )) GROUP BY dateTemp.date

SELECT dateTemp.date AS date, IFNULL( sum( ri.price ), 0 ) AS price FROM ( SELECT date FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( DATE_SUB( last_day( curdate()), INTERVAL xc - 1 DAY ), '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS date FROM ( SELECT @xi := @xi + 1 AS xc FROM ( SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 ) xc1, ( SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 ) xc2, ( SELECT @xi := 0 ) xc0 ) xcxc ) x0 WHERE x0.date >= ( SELECT date_add( curdate(), INTERVAL - DAY ( curdate())+ 1 DAY ))) AS dateTemp LEFT JOIN register_info ri ON ( DATE_FORMAT( ri.register_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( dateTemp.date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AND ri.STATUS != '0' AND ri.STATUS != '5' ) GROUP BY dateTemp.date

SELECT dateTemp.date AS date, IFNULL( sum( ri.drug_price ), 0 ) AS price FROM ( SELECT date FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( DATE_SUB( last_day( curdate()), INTERVAL xc - 1 DAY ), '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS date FROM ( SELECT @xi := @xi + 1 AS xc FROM ( SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 ) xc1, ( SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 ) xc2, ( SELECT @xi := 0 ) xc0 ) xcxc ) x0 WHERE x0.date >= ( SELECT date_add( curdate(), INTERVAL - DAY ( curdate())+ 1 DAY ))) AS dateTemp LEFT JOIN register_info ri ON ( DATE_FORMAT( ri.register_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( dateTemp.date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AND ri.STATUS != '0' AND ri.STATUS != '5' ) GROUP BY dateTemp.date
